doc.field: JERSEY RESOURCES [NJR] FILES TO OFFER STOCK

- New Jersey Resources Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission to offer 1.3 mln common shares through managing underwriters Merrill Lynch Capital Markets and E.F. Hutton and Co. The utility holding company said the offering should be completed in late March or early April. Net proceeds will be used to reduce debt at the company's main subsidiary, New Jersey Natural Gas Co.
